title: Not just your average sausage
creator_credit: Denis Harvey, Martin Didsbury and Television One (New Zealand)
brief_description: Provides a description of the manufacture of salami from its source to the consumer. Highlights the role of the European tradition to the high level of skills required in the processing of salami.
